entities.description: A code representing a specific drug used in treatment.
The name of the drug used in treatment.
The number of times the drug is mentioned under 'OTHER, Specifies'.
The percentage of all treatment drugs specified that this drug represents.

relationships.description: Associates a drug with its corresponding code used in treatment.
Associates a drug with its name used in treatment.
Relates a drug to the number of times it is mentioned under 'OTHER, Specifies'.
Indicates the percentage of all treatment drugs specified that this drug represents.
